An ime Synopsis:

In "Slayers: The Book of Spells," follow the thrilling escapades of the powerful sorceress Lina Inverse and her cunning partner Naga the Serpent as they embark on a series of daring adventures in pursuit of wealth, sustenance, and self-preservation. In "The Scary Chimera Plan," the duo confronts a deranged magician who seeks to create an invincible chimera using Lina as a key ingredient. Next, in "Jeffry's Knighthood," Lina and Naga are employed by an overbearing mother to transform her feeble son into a valiant knight by aiding him in a battle against ruthless marauders. Lastly, "Mirror, Mirror" finds the pair racing to apprehend a rogue sorcerer who has uncovered an ancient artifact capable of generating loyal replicas of anyone, including his foes. Prepare for a whirlwind of magic, laughter, and unforgettable exploits in this action-packed anime!
